results.title: Simvastatin reduces infarct size in a model of acute myocardial ischemia and reperfusion in the rat.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: In @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, which received the vehicle for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10% @CHEMICAL_Dimethyl_Sulfoxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004121 @@@DMSO@@@, 1 ml/kg i.v. at 1 h prior to the @<m>DISEASE_Leukocyte_adhesion_deficiency_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535887 @@@occlusion of the LAD@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Leukocyte_adhesion_deficiency_type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535887 @@@occlusion of the LAD@@@ for 25 min followed by reperfusion for 2 hours resulted in an @DISEASE_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D007238 @@@infarct@@@ size of 54 +/- 4% (n=7) of the AR.

citations.NLM: Wayman NS, Ellis BL, Thiemermann C. Simvastatin reduces infarct size in a model of acute myocardial ischemia and reperfusion in the rat. Med Sci Monit. 2003 May;9(5):BR155-9. PMID: 12761443
citations.BibTeX: @article{12761443, title={Simvastatin reduces infarct size in a model of acute myocardial ischemia and reperfusion in the rat.}, author={Wayman NS and Ellis BL and Thiemermann C}, journal={Med Sci Monit}, volume={9}, number={5}, pages={BR155-9}}
